trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_SEQ_00<tab>With great popularity comes great filth, as Managingway well knows.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_SEQ_01<tab>Speak with the cleanly Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale.
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_SEQ_02<tab>Deliver the requested items to Managingway.
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the cleanly Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale.

TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E4E8050A ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050B ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050C ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80509 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050D ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050E ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E8050F ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80510 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var>)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Managingway)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.

TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_MANAGINGWAY_000_000<tab>In no small part due to your efforts, many Ways have begun frequenting the Dreaming Workshop. And while this is a pleasing development, the increase in traffic has led to more filth, which our cleaners struggle to deal with.

TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_MANAGINGWAY_000_001<tab>I raised the matter with Inventingway, who has agreed to upgrade the cleaner machina. He simply requires some components, which I would like you to supply.

TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_MANAGINGWAY_000_002<tab>You recall the cleaner, yes? Inventingway believes there's room to upgrade it further, and it would be remiss of us to ignore this opportunity to further improve operational efficiency. To wit, I'd like you to supply the necessary components once more.
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_MANAGINGWAY_000_003<tab>If you would take yourself to Greatest Endsvale, my cleanly colleague there will furnish you with the requisite materials. Many thanks in advance!
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_LOPORRIT04695_000_010<tab>I'm a lean, mean, cleaning machine! ...Actually, that's the machine over there─and we're going to upgrade it, you say!? Music to my ears!
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_LOPORRIT04695_000_011<tab>Here, please use these materials to craft a component for enhancing the drivetrain.
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_LOPORRIT04695_000_012<tab>Here, please use these materials to craft a component for enhancing the polishing attachment.
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_LOPORRIT04695_000_013<tab>Here, please use these materials to craft a component for enhancing the power supply.
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_LOPORRIT04695_000_014<tab>Managingway will take it off your hands when it's ready. And if you require more materials, just let me know!
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_LOPORRIT04695_000_020<tab>Hello again! Need more materials, do you? ...Ah no, you still have some.
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_LOPORRIT04695_000_021<tab>Hello again! Need more materials, do you? ...Ah no, you still have some.
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_LOPORRIT04695_000_022<tab>Hello again! Need more materials, do you? ...Ah no, you still have some.
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_LOPORRIT04695_000_023<tab>Hello again! Need more materials, do you? Here you go, then!
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_LOPORRIT04695_000_024<tab>Hello again! Need more materials, do you? Here you go, then!
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_LOPORRIT04695_000_025<tab>Hello again! Need more materials, do you? Here you go, then!
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_MANAGINGWAY_000_030<tab>Do you perchance have a cleaner component for me?
TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_MANAGINGWAY_000_031<tab>Much obliged! I will deliver this to Inventingway at once!

TEXT_BANLOP109_04695_MANAGINGWAY_000_032<tab>Though our friend tends to come up with nonsensical inventions, with appropriate management, he also produces highly useful ones. I shall do my best to steer his genius in the right direction!
